metadata.dc:author: De Nova García, M J
Barbería Leache, E
Planells del Pozo, P
Costa Ferrer, F
metadata.dc:description: The purpose of this article is to present a treatment of dentinogenesis imperfecta in a 3 years old child. We reviewed some of the aspects to consider in the treatments of this alteration in primary dentition.
metadata.dc:title: El odontopediatra ante la dentinogénesis imperfecta.
[The pedodontist and dentinogenesis imperfecta].
